title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pelvic bones in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pelvic bones in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing pelvic bones in a dream indicates bad things, sins, and transgressions. Also, seeing pelvic bones in a dream indicates the interests that the dreamer takes, and indicates that he commits immorality and loses money, and God knows best. As Seeing pelvic bones in a dream indicates an act of adultery, the goal of which is to commit immorality and the dreamer’s lack of self-control, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing pelvic bones in her dream, this indicates the many sins and corruption that she commits and her livelihood. Also, seeing a broken pelvic bone in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the brilliant success and superiority that she is trying to achieve. Also, seeing the pelvic bones in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the end of committing bad deeds and a return to sadness and pain. Seeing the pelvic bones in a dream for an unmarried girl in The dream indicates her marriage to a man who does not speak rudely, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating pelvic bones, this indicates the bad deeds that she will commit in her life. Also, seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a married woman It indicates the commission of disobedience and sins and also indicates the betrayal of her husband, and God knows best. Also, seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a married woman indicates that her children have committed a great sin for which they will be tested, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams of seeing pelvic bones This indicates the difficulty of giving birth and that she will give birth to a child as a result of a forbidden act. Also, seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her husband did something forbidden and that he betrayed one of her friends. Interpretation of seeing pelvic bones in a dream for a man: If a person dreams of seeing pelvic bones, this indicates many sins. And not repenting and believing in God Almighty. Also, seeing the pelvic bones in a married man’s dream indicates disagreements that will end between him and his wife, and God knows best. This vision also indicates the marriage of an unmarried man to a paralyzed girl and a girl who is deceived by her and her actions. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it Comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a horse in a dream shows many different connotations and meanings. A mare or horse in a dream indicates a high position and prestige, in addition to good luck and good news. It is not surprising that this relationship and symbolism is reflected in the world of dreams, so how do the great dream interpreters interpret seeing a horse and its symbol in a dream, and when we see it in our dreams it will certainly have many symbols and meanings that we will refer to through the interpretation of the dream of seeing a horse.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the horse Ibn Seeing a horse in a dream indicates that goodness has arrived for the pioneer. And whoever sees himself riding a horse in a dream, this dream symbolizes the desire of the dreamer and seeks to cooperate with one of the righteous. And whoever sees himself riding a horse with wings in a dream, this dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain strength. If an unmarried girl sees herself riding a horse, then this is evidence that the dreamer is trying to commit immoral acts and sins that God has forbidden. Interpretation of a dream in which an unmarried woman sees a horse. If an unmarried girl sees herself riding a horse, then this It means that she will marry a good and pious man. If he sees that he is buying a horse, this indicates good intentions for her. As for seeing a horse in the water, it means that what has not been completed, whether marriage or work. Interpretation of dreams to see a horse for a married woman: To dream of a woman married to a Persian It means that she will receive a large inheritance and livelihood. As for seeing a one-eyed horse in your dream, this indicates the difficulty of life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a horse for a man: A man sees a large horse in his dream, which indicates his marriage if he is not married, and it also shows that his wife will adhere to religion. As for seeing him become A horse, this means that he is distinguished by pride and dignity and reaches a high status. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a horse in a dream: Seeing a horse with feathers indicates an honorable man with a high status. And whoever sees horses coming from afar, this is good news. If an unmarried woman sees that she is riding a horse, this It indicates her marriage to a man who has a high social status. Whoever sees the death of a horse or its slaughter, this indicates the problems and difficulties that the fortuneteller faces. A white horse in a married woman’s dream indicates good news, and a sick horse indicates her husband’s illness. A black horse for a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a boy. For a pregnant woman, a horse indicates a safe pregnancy and childbirth. A dream about a horse sees a married woman riding a horse in a dream. To dream that a married woman is riding a horse means a beautiful life and achieving what she wants. Seeing a horse for a married woman in a dream indicates honor, prestige, and high status among people. Seeing a horse White denotes glory, honor, and honour, and is better than a black horse. If a married woman sees herself riding a horse, this indicates her good relationship with her husband, loyalty, love, and the stability of her married life. Seeing a white horse in a married woman’s room is evidence of justice and piety. If she sees that her husband He gave her a white horse, this indicates good news. If he sees

title: I dreamed that I had sex with a man I knew from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I had sex with a man I know. It is one of the visions that many people dream about and has many connotations that indicate good and evil sometimes depending on the type of dreamer and his condition during the dream. I dreamed that I had sex with a man I know When a woman dreams that she is having sex with one of her acquaintances, This is a sign that she will get married soon and she feels anxious about the matter and thinks about it constantly. Seeing a married woman indicates her connection to someone she knows, who is her husband, and this is evidence of her great love for him and her desire to stabilize the relationship between them after the disputes that arose in the previous period. But if the dreamer sees that she She has intercourse with a man she knows and it is not permissible for her, as this is a sign that she is far from God, and an indication that she has committed sin and transgression and that she needs to repent to God. I dreamed that I had sex with a man I know from Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted a married woman’s vision of her husband having intercourse with her on It is a sign of great affection and love between them and the stability of their married life. If a married woman sees herself in a relationship with a man she knows other than her husband, this is a sign that this man will help her solve a problem. When a girl dreams that she is having sex with her sister, this is a sign of their wonderful relationship with Each other. As for the woman who monitors her relationship with someone she knows and it is forbidden, this is a sign that she has sinned and is far from God and the path of truth. Seeing a married woman indicates intercourse with someone because of the marital disputes that she is going through during this period. I dreamed that I was having sex with a man I know and he Single: Seeing a single girl with someone she knows and having sex with him in a dream is a sign that she will soon marry this young man and their life will be happy. Seeing a girl indicates that he had intercourse with someone he knows and then took a bath, which indicates that he repented of his past mistakes and corruption. A single girl having sex with someone she knows who is a celebrity shows that she wants to become famous one day. But if the unmarried girl sees that she is forced to have sex with someone she knows, this is an indication that she is sick or exposed to a health crisis. Seeing an unmarried girl leaves The person she wants to associate with in a dream means that she will overcome a major disaster that could have befallen her, God willing. When a non-relative girl sees herself associated with a young man who she knows is handsome and white, this is a sign that she will get married soon. I dreamed that I had sex with a man I know From a married woman: When a married woman sees herself having intercourse with her husband, this indicates that she loves him very much and is also an indication of the stability of their marital life. Seeing a married woman shows her attachment to her father in a dream, as he strongly supports her in all the difficult situations she goes through and always stands by her side until She will overcome it. But if the wife has intercourse with a man she knew and it is not permissible for her, then this is a sign that she has committed sins and disagreements between her and her husband. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman from Ibn Sirin and seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman. Seeing menstrual blood for a married woman portends goodness or illness? What are the negative symbols of a dream about menstruation for a married woman? What does black menstrual blood dream of in a married woman? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood for married, pregnant and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman. Scientists interpreted menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman as evidence that she is happy in her married life and is spending her most beautiful moments with her husband. If she sees it, she will become pregnant. If a woman has contaminated menstrual blood, this means that she has many disagreements with her partner at the present time and cannot understand him and is thinking about divorce. However, if a man sees his wife during her menstrual period in a dream, this indicates that she will understand that. You have many children in the near future and you will enjoy happiness and peace of mind with them. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing menstrual blood in a dream as evidence of love and mutual respect between the dreamer and her partner and her desire to make him happy and satisfy him. If the dreamer sees menstrual blood staining Her clothes, this is a sign of the problems she is currently going through and the fears and negative thoughts that plague her. Black menstrual blood symbolizes exposure to health problems and the vision may be a warning to her. For the dreamer to take care of her health and get enough rest so that her condition does not worsen. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a woman Pregnant Scientists interpreted the vision of menstrual blood for a pregnant woman as a sign of the loss of the fetus, and she must visit a doctor, examine her health condition, and stay away from anything that worries her or causes her discomfort and stress. It is said that menstrual blood in a dream symbolizes the birth of a male, especially if the dreamer does not know the sex of her fetus. Seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream. Scientists interpret seeing menstrual blood for a divorced woman as a sign of an imminent marriage contract with a good man who will improve her, fulfill all her dreams, and compensate her for the difficult times she went through in the previous period. Black menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream is a sign of deficiency in performing prayers and obligatory duties, and she must hasten to repent before it is too late. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman. It has been said that seeing menstrual blood on clothes is a sign that the dreamer is facing a major challenge at the present time. And he is doing his best to win this challenge. Menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman. Scientists interpreted menstrual blood in a married woman’s dream as good news of abundant sustenance and wealth. Menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman. It is said that menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman foretells that she will gain a lot of money. Money from her work in the coming tomorrow, and the vision for a woman who is suffering from reproductive problems is good news that she will become pregnant

title: Interpretation of a dream about sexual harassment by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and the consequences of a dream about sexual harassment.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and the consequences of a dream about harassment. A person has some bad visions that put him in a suspicious situation, and searching for an interpretation of this vision makes the owner want to know what evidence it contains. Dream interpreters have adopted each one of them to know the interpretation of dreams with Knowledge of the dreamer's social status, which is one of the visions that these people want you to know is the truth. It is the interpretation of a dream about harassment. Interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Harassment in a dream is one of the visions that everyone hates and indicates the commission of some prohibited acts in reality. We will explain to you the interpretation of the following dream about harassment in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that his interpretation in a dream indicates Generally, it refers to the acquisition of forbidden money from one of the areas that God and His Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, perhaps from an orphan’s money or money resulting from usury. He also explained that in some other cases, seeing harassment in a dream still means that you are entering into someone’s honor and speaking About his reputation in an inappropriate way, especially since he is a good person with a good reputation. Interpretation of dreams of harassing a maid: If one sees in a dream that he is harassing a woman, this indicates that the dreamer indulges in lust, forgets what awaits him in punishment later, and forgets the power of Almighty God in justice and punishment. If one sees sexual harassment in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has taken an immoral person as his friend, and even made him a close friend. Interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream differs from some other social situations such as a married woman or A single girl, so we wanted to present to you the following in detail, its interpretation in a pregnant dream is as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is being harassed, this means that this woman will face many problems and crises that will negatively affect her reputation. If a pregnant woman sees In a dream, she is being sexually harassed by a person she does not know, with whom she has no relationship or acquaintance, and this person is distinguished by a beautiful face and a distinctive aesthetic appearance, so this is clear. An indication from God Almighty that He will give her a beautiful child distinguished by good qualities and beautiful boxing. If a pregnant woman dreams of being harassed by a member of her family, such as a father, uncle, or brother, this means that this woman will be dominated by a period of sadness, anguish, and distress, which indicates that she will leave someone What.Interpretation of a dream about harassment from relatives: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is being harassed by someone she does not know and has no relationship or acquaintance with her, and this person has an ugly, unwanted face, this indicates many problems and difficulties that the pregnant woman will face in the future. Her life. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is being abused by someone she knows or one of her relatives, this means that this woman will face many problems and difficulties that will ultimately lead to her separation from her husband. title: Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend’s engagement

preview.html: Interpreting a dream about my friend’s engagement, we can say that there is a large group of sources that allow many people to know the correct interpretation of the dreams that they see during the dream, for several main reasons, the most important of which is the study of many people. The science of interpreting dreams in an accurate scientific manner, in addition to the amount of efforts made by accepted scholars in this field, as scholars from ancient times were able to access a large number of interpretations related to the group of dreams, which indicates the necessity of familiarity and knowledge of these sources, in addition to the broad definition of interpretation. The correct view is to see a dream about the engagement of a friend of both sexes. Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend’s engagement: The dream about my girlfriend’s engagement in a dream can be interpreted in the following points: If the girl is beautiful and has not yet married, this means that she will achieve all her desired goals. This dream has also been interpreted to mean happiness, closeness to joy, and salvation for the friend from the worries and sorrow that she suffers from in her life. This vision may indicate the love and familiarity that prevails in the dreamer’s relationship with this friend. Another interpretation of this vision is that the friend represents a problem and that the insight On his side until she gets rid of this problem. If the beloved is not beautiful, this means that her engagement takes place without the consent of the groom or the bride, and one of the parties is forced to this engagement. Whoever sees in her dream that she is attending her friend’s engagement, then her vision means that the dreamer will fulfill her desires. As for If the beloved is unknown, that is, seeing her in a dream for the first time, then this means the death of a relative of hers, and this dream was also interpreted as a new promotion at work and success in professional life. But if the beloved is known, that is, she is already a friend, then this means achieving the aspirations that It is expected to come true, and this dream has also been interpreted as closeness of joy, good news, and broad strength for her. Her friend. From the dream. A friend’s marriage in a dream means fatigue, hardship, and imprisonment. If the beloved is divorced, this means the death of all the problems and worries that came from her previous marriage, and in the near future joy, happiness, joy, and good news will prevail. If the friend dies from her husband, this means a happy life after her great sadness. On the death of her husband and she will be able to achieve what she is looking for on earth. Whoever sees in her dream that her married friend is engaged and wearing A dress or an engagement ring in a dream. This vision indicates that this friend and her husband will earn a lot of food during the coming period. One of the most promising visions is the dream of a married woman’s engagement to someone other than her husband. Such a vision indicates that joy will soon prevail in the life of this friend. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my pregnant friend. An auspicious dream is a dream about the engagement of a pregnant friend. It is an indication that this friend will receive many good things. This vision also shows ease, security, and happiness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about excessive hair loss

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing excessive hair loss in a dream for a single girl: Ibn Sirin believes that a girl’s excessive hair loss indicates that this girl is doing repulsive or forbidden acts. If this girl is in a relationship, then severe hair loss indicates separation from her fiancé or lover. Or hair may fall out a lot. Because that girl is going through psychological pressure and a lot of heartache at that time. But if the falling hair is thick and curly, she will get rid of the worries and sorrows that she was going through. If the girl’s hair fell out while combing it, she will hear a lot of good news. But if the hair fell out During ablution, interpretation scholars see it as a sign of the approach of marriage and partnership. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of hair loss when touching an unmarried woman. Interpretation of seeing abundant hair loss in a dream for a married woman. Some commentators believe that a woman’s hair loss is evidence of the woman’s fear of God Almighty and her commitment to the duties of obedience. If a married woman sees that her hair is falling out while combing it, she may be pregnant with a male child. Or, hair loss while combing could be one of the harbingers of living abundantly and getting a lot of money. However, Ibn Sirin believes that heavy hair loss in a married woman is a sign There are many differences between her and her husband. If a married woman sees her husband bald in a dream, she can divorce her husband. A lot of hair loss in a married woman indicates the loss of many good opportunities before her. If a married woman sees her husband’s hair falling out in front of her in a dream, this is a vision that indicates On the presence of another woman in her husband’s life. Dream interpretation of excessive hair loss in a pregnant woman’s dream. Hair loss in a pregnant woman is due to this woman’s poor diet and her inability to maintain her health. The pregnant woman’s hair loss also shows this woman’s excessive fear for the fetus. If the hair If the hair falling out from a pregnant woman is white, interpretive scholars see it as a sign of the birth of a boy. However, if her hair is falling out a lot and red, she may give birth to a girl. Some commentators believe that a pregnant woman’s hair loss indicates the approaching time of childbirth and she must prepare for that. If the woman is happy with the loss of her thick hair, she will change. Her life after childbirth, God willing. Excessive hair loss during combing indicates the multiple livelihoods that will appear before her after childbirth. Seeing excessive hair loss in a divorced woman’s dream. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband combing her hair and it falls out in the dream, then she can return to this man and put an end to the problems. The list is between them. Or the loss of coarse and curly hair could be a sign of an improvement in the psychological state and mood of the dreamer. If a divorced woman sees her hair falling out next to her bed, then she can marry a good man who will provide her with a decent life. Hair loss while bathing also indicates an improvement in his economic situation And financial in the coming period. However, if a woman grieves over severe hair loss, that woman may need psychological support during this time. Some experts believe that

title: Interpretation of seeing jinn in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing jinn in a dream or a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Jinn are creatures that humans cannot see and have supernatural powers. Their existence has been proven in the Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. Seeing jeans in a dream has many different interpretations, and interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing jeans in a dream. The dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the Roya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation Ibn Shirin’s vision of the jinn in a dream: Seeing jeans in a dream indicates meeting scholars and enjoying their company. Seeing jeans in a dream indicates the continuous pursuit of knowledge and knowledge. Seeing jeans in a dream may indicate people who want to attack the dreamer’s house and steal his house. Seeing jeans in a dream indicates A person who is extremely cunning and intelligent to the point that people take precautions and warn them against him. Seeing a change into bad jeans in a dream indicates that the viewer does not enjoy the love of the people around him. See also: Interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing jeans in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing jeans in a dream A dream refers to people who plan and strive in every way to deceive God. Seeing a dream that you are fighting with jeans shows the dreamer’s insight and enables him to distinguish between good and evil. Seeing someone hitting him with jeans in a dream indicates that the dreamer is far from religion and is not committed to worshiping and obeying God. Seeing someone being chased Jean in a dream It indicates his strength, confidence, and distinguished position that makes him able to conquer his opponents. See also: Interpretation of seeing a crazy person in a dream What is the interpretation of a man who sees jeans in a dream: Seeing a jeans man in a dream It indicates the commitment that one must have to obey God and remember often He is protected from evil. Seeing a famous man indicates that someone is trying to keep him away from obedience and prevent him from walking on the path of righteousness. Seeing a man in jeans walking behind him indicates evil people who are trying to wake him up in the trap of disobedience and following desires. Seeing a genie descending on him in a dream indicates that The dreamer commits sins and disobedience and deviates from the path of truth and guidance. Seeing a jinn man touching him or holding him indicates that he is dealing with many problems that worry him and disrupt his life. Seeing a man afraid of jeans in a dream indicates a state of confusion and sadness that prevails in this period. See also: Interpretation Seeing a funeral in a dream What is the interpretation of Jane who sees an unmarried woman in a dream: Seeing one pair of jeans in a dream indicates the instability of her psychological state, her dispersion, feeling of loneliness and fear of the coming days. Seeing one pair of jeans in a dream may indicate the presence of people whom she considers They are close to her, but they harbor feelings of hatred and hatred towards her. Seeing an unmarried woman reading the Qur’an to expel the jinn indicates the release of her fears and

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone else’s hairstyle according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing combing their hair in a dreamSome girls and women often see in a dream that they are combing their hair, whether long or short, as most interpretive scholars indicate that the condition of the hair in the dream is an indicator of the psychological state or mood they are experiencing. About the woman at that time, but the interpretation of this may differ when the hairstyle of another person, whether male or female, is close to insight or an unknown person, so let us discover more interpretations in the following lines. Explanation of combing hair by Ibn Sirin: In general, seeing hair Being combed in a dream is one of the good visions that some may see in a dream, because it indicates one’s concern for one’s appearance and care for one’s hair, health, or sociability. Combing tangled hair in a dream: If the hair is tangled and suffers from breakage and cannot be combed in any way, as the dreamer feels pain, this indicates that he is facing some problems in the field of work, as he may be chased by a colleague or persecuted by managers, and it could It also indicates a health illness. If the unmarried girl is the one you see in the dream, this indicates that she has left a romantic relationship that lasted for several years, which makes her feel sad and emotionally empty. If she is engaged and about to get married, then this indicates that she is feeling tense and pressured due to the approaching wedding date. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Nabulsi’s hairstyle: If a person sees himself holding the hair of his relative or friend, this indicates that he will alleviate his sorrows or worries and can make him overcome. He will face some financial crises or help him find a new job, and if his hair is messy, this indicates that. There are disagreements or problems between him and that person on earth, as reality affects his psychological state and makes him see her in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a girl’s hairstyle: When an unmarried man sees in a dream that he is combing the hair of a girl he does not know, this indicates marriage at this time or a connection with a girl with whom he does not know. Extraordinary beauty, but if the hair is tangled, this indicates the lack of financial ability of the person, which gives him the ability to form a marital nest. When you see the teeth of the comb, which are wide and allow the strands to pass easily, this indicates the ability to nourish and acquire abundant money, or indicates the necessity of paying Zakat or charity, and if it is limited, it indicates limited livelihood and the accumulation of debts on the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about combing hair in a dream: If hair is cut, this indicates radical changes in life, whether in terms of work, i.e. searching for a new job or traveling abroad and moving on to a new life. Another new one, and if the married woman is the one who sees that, then that indicates that. The birth of a new baby, and if the man is married, this indicates the end of an old relationship and the beginning of a new relationship, and God is the Most High. Sources:- 1- The Book of Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut, 2000.2- Maaj

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing raw meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing raw meat in a dream: We get the meat that we eat from the bodies of animals such as buffalo, cows, goats, sheep, etc., and each type has its own taste. In detail, the various interpretations that we have received from scholars interpret this dream through the following lines: Article. Seeing raw meat in a dream. Seeing raw meat in a dream Jurists have mentioned many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Whoever sees in his sleep that he is eating raw meat, this is a sign that he is earning money illegally, and is surrounded by those who follow him and envy him. In the case of eating raw horse meat during his sleep, this makes him an uncourageous person. He lacks chivalry, and lacks self-confidence and dignity. Imam Nabulsi - may God have mercy on him - says that raw snake or scorpion meat in a dream symbolizes that the fortuneteller speaks badly about his opponent or whoever is competing with him. If one sees raw beef during his sleep, this is a sign of... He feels pain, gives up his work, and suffers from poverty and lack of money. Eating raw beef indicates a deepening of people’s symptoms, so he must stop this wrong act and repent to God. You will find all the interpretations of dreams and visions by Ibn Sirin. A website about the secrets of dream interpretation from Google. Seeing raw meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the most important indications that was mentioned. On the authority of Imam Muhammad bin Shirin - may God have mercy on him - in the interpretation of a dream about raw meat the following: Raw meat in a dream symbolizes committing forbidden things and sins, especially if the dreamer eats from it. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating raw meat, this is a sign of loss, loss, or abandonment. About work and losing money, which causes a lot of sadness to the dreamer. A married woman’s dream of eating raw meat leads her to face many difficulties in her life and many disagreements with her partner. If the color of raw meat is red during sleep, this is a sign of gossip, hatred, and malice among people. Seeing raw meat inside the house in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer in his life because he will face many difficulties. If the raw meat freezes in the dream, it leads to the continuation of committing sins and the obligation to stop doing so. Seeing raw meat in a single woman’s dreamIf the girl sees in her dream that she If she cuts meat with a knife into small pieces, this is a sign that she is constantly subject to disagreements with her fiancé and may lead to separation. If an unmarried woman cuts raw meat into large slices in a dream, this means that she will be surrounded by many bad friends and she must beware of them and stay away from them. Sheikh Ibn Shaheen explained that a girl who cuts raw meat during her sleep symbolizes her failure in her studies if she is a science student or her interruption if she graduates. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is trying to cut raw meat with a knife but fails, this is evidence of her inability to take responsibility for her home yet. Marriage. Seeing raw meat in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman cutting raw meat with a knife in a dream indicates
